title: Lijili (1980) Genesis Portion
description: Jili (Lijili) is a Plateau language of Nigeria. It is one of several languages which go by the ambiguous name Koro. Due to 19th-century slave raids, Jili speakers are scattered across different areas of central Nigeria.

language.name: Lijili
language.area: Nassarawa state, Awe and Lafia LGAs.
